duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage and maintain the model and community as a personal retail business
Conduct weekly customer care calls and community team meetings to review the status of the community backlog, closings, starts, customer issues/concerns, and community and model maintenance items
Maintain clean and complete inventory of all sales collateral and flags and exterior signage
Complete the buying experience with every customer until the CUSTOMER ends the process and get a commitment from each prospect
Be a great team player for sales partner, construction team, design studio coordinators, mortgage team, customer care coordinators, title company, and ce team
Execute clean and precise paperwork, attend all pre-construction meetings, and adhere to all company policies and procedures

Develop and implement a lead generation plan, maintain a current inventory list, and be knowledgeable about the HOA deeds, school system, public report, community covenants, and restrictions for the communities
Work with a positive attitude, readiness, and integrity, be a problem solver, and maintain a professional appearance and neat car at all times

Walk customer’s home at least once every two weeks, meet or exceed sales and closing goals, and register all prospects and record them in MSCRM immediately according to the Prospect Registration Policy
Shop the competition, complete CMA tools, attend all sales meetings and trainings as scheduled, and be willing to perform other duties as assigned

Meet with prospects to show and sell in a Taylor Morrison community, tour with and demonstrate to prospects model homes and home sites within the Taylor Morrison community, visit non-Taylor Morrison real estate sales agents and brokers in their offices, perform inspection of competing neighborhoods and communities, and tour the Taylor Morrison community to ensure that it is attractive to prospective customers, and meet with construction personnel to ensure customer satisfaction throughout the sale and construction of the new home
Work out of a temporary sales facility, take the prospect out to the various home sites within the Taylor Morrison community, and perform marketing efforts in conjunction with accomplishing a sale

education_certification.credential:
Active Real Estate License (where applicable by state)
Proficiency in all Microsoft Office Applications and savvy computer skills
Customer service oriented and flexible with prioritizing tasks to meet deadlines
